Metadata.title: Schedule social media content across all platforms effortlessly
Metadata.description: Plan your content calendar weeks ahead, auto-post to multiple networks, and grow your audience consistently.

taglines: AI suggests best posting times based on your audience data
Auto-schedule posts when your followers are most active
Maximize engagement with data-driven posting schedules

SectionHero.headline: Schedule social media content across all platforms effortlessly
SectionHero.paragraph: Plan your content calendar weeks ahead, auto-post to multiple networks, and grow your audience consistently.

SectionPricing.label: Pricing
SectionPricing.headline: A pricing that adapts to your needs

questions.question: Which social platforms are supported?
questions.answer: ContentCalendar supports all major platforms including Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, LinkedIn, TikTok, and Pinterest. You can manage all your accounts from one unified dashboard.

questions.question: How accurate is the AI timing recommendation?
questions.answer: Our AI analyzes your historical engagement data and audience behavior patterns to recommend posting times. Most users see a 30-40% increase in engagement when following our suggestions.

questions.question: Can multiple team members collaborate?
questions.answer: Absolutely! You can invite team members, assign roles, and set approval workflows to ensure content quality before it goes live.
